output.conclusion: This course has provided an advanced overview of key topics in Obstetrics and Gynecology. Further study and clinical experience are essential for continued learning and expertise in this field.
output.introduction: Welcome to the Advanced Obstetrics & Gynecology course. This course is designed for advanced learners and will cover complex topics in OBG, focusing on the latest research and clinical practices.

chapters.description: In-depth analysis of electronic fetal monitoring (EFM), including interpretation of complex patterns and application of advanced techniques like fetal ECG.
Strategies for managing pregnancies complicated by maternal medical conditions (e.g., cardiac disease, diabetes) and fetal anomalies.

modules.moduleTitle: Advanced Fetal Assessment and High-Risk Pregnancy

chapters.description: Advanced surgical techniques for the treatment of severe endometriosis, including laparoscopic and robotic approaches.
Detailed review of complex hysterectomy procedures, including management of adhesions and anatomical variations.
Latest advancements in the surgical and chemotherapeutic management of advanced-stage ovarian cancer.
Overview of targeted therapies and immunotherapies for gynecologic cancers, including mechanisms of action and clinical applications.
Exploration of advanced ART techniques, including preimplantation genetic testing (PGT) and mitochondrial replacement therapy.
Comprehensive approach to the evaluation and management of recurrent pregnancy loss, including genetic and immunological factors.
